column3: They moan, they groan, they slam doors and squeak floorboards! Earplugs sold separately.
First-rate thrall with a pleasant attitude and half a century of experience. Contract involved - Igor is a MinUnion member.
Chad is here for you with his winning smile! Chad is definitely not a plant sent by the Anti-Vampire Brigade. Chaaaaad.
Like the kind from the popular children's television show
A vicious swarm for protecting your home! Rabies shot sold separately.
They travel in packs and howl at the moon and eat watermelon sometimes! A must-have for any foreboding castle.
Yass queen! Comes in marble, onyx, and artisanal oak, cherry, walnut, and maple.
Perfect for a restful slumber uninterrupted by a scorching fiery death from mid-morning sunbeams
We could all use more for hurling across the room in a fit of vampire drama. Pitchers are currently unavailable - we hurled our stock across the room because reasons.
Nothing sets the mood quite like candlelight. Candelabra included!
Keep your next meal from becoming to-go!
Are they fake? Do you have a garden somewhere? Why don't they ever wilt??? Keep your guests guessing with these fabulous flowers!
Is it hard work, looking so good? Available in all colors.
Be mysterious - hand out free kittens. Pairs well with our cape selection.
Everyone has bad days. Plan in advance for the Anti-Vampire Brigade. Worn here by the brilliant Aishwarya Rai Bachchan.
Perfect for the undead in your life who enjoys a night in. Also available in Elmo, Oscar, and Big Bird.
Just like it says on the tin. Nothing else withstands the bat transformation, let's be real here.
Keep the wind out of your eyes while flying! Worn here by Colonel Sassacre.
Our own proprietary blend! * Note: Your results may vary.
Keep those fangs healthy! One tube of Tasty O- Toothpaste included.
A self-help book for those of us who have a more complicated relationships with blood.
Put a little color back in those pale cheeks! Available in all colors - we customize just for you! Mirror not included.
Keep those fangs sharp while you sleep with this new chocolate-flavored bite guard! Definitely not just a piece of chocolate.
You're never too old for a classic. Guaranteed to keep that garlic smell and also the ocean out!
